content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- Check out the distinct values
-- SELECT DISTINCT [ActorGender] FROM [ext].[Catalog]
-- SELECT DISTINCT [ActorName], [ActorGender] FROM [ext].[Catalog] ORDER BY ActorName


-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK INTEGER;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(MovieRatingSK), 0) FROM [dbo].[DimRatings]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[DimActors] (
	MovieRatingSK,
	MovieRatingDescription
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY extTable.Rating) AS MovieRatingSK,
		extTable.Rating AS MovieRatingDescription
	FROM (
		SELECT
			DISTINCT CASE
				WHEN [Rating] = 'PG=13' THEN 'PG-13'
				ELSE [Rating]
			END AS Rating
		FROM
			[ext].[Catalog]
	) extTable
) CleansedRatings
WHERE CleansedRatings.MovieRatingDescription NOT IN (SELECT ActorName FROM [dbo].[DimActors])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DimActors]

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimActors] (
    [ActorSK]     INT              NOT NULL,
    [ActorID]     UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL,
    [ActorName]   VARCHAR (81)     NOT NULL,
    [ActorGender] CHAR (1)         NOT NULL
)
WITH (HEAP, DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [ext].[Catalog] (
	[SourceSystemID] int,
	[GlobalMovieID] varchar(8000),
	[SourceSystemMovieID] varchar(8000),
	[SouthridgeMovieID] varchar(8000),
	[ActorID] varchar(8000),
	[ActorName] varchar(8000),
	[ActorGender] varchar(8000),
	[Title] varchar(8000),
	[Genre] varchar(8000),
	[Rating] varchar(8000),
	[RuntimeMinutes] int,
	[TheatricalReleaseYear] int,
	[PhysicalAvailabilityDate] date,
	[StreamingAvailabilityDate] date
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/curated/catalog.parquet/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [movies_demosynapsedls01],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO
